Location.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ChopTree">Action Location</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ChopTree">Action Location</ecoicon>: The position where the interaction took place.

Districts.internalDescription: 3 Districts3 DistrictsCapital Roads 3 Federal Highways State Routes

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ChopTree">Felled</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ChopTree">Felled</ecoicon>: Was the tree felled?

Left.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ChopTree">Growth Percent</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ChopTree">Growth Percent</ecoicon>: A value of 100 represents a fully grown tree, 0 represents a newly-planted seed.
